messages.event-attendees-info: Attendees are able to join your event within dates you select.
messages.sub-sologan: The Ultimate Q&A and Polling Platform for Company Meetings and Events
messages.card-intro-des1: The workshop is a meeting of a group of people with the same common interest at a predetermined place and time to debate the content of interest. The most popular seminars are based on industries, careers, and general fans.

messages.phone-intro-description: Adaptable to all mobile devices today, easy to manipulate. Participants in presentations and seminars can easily ask questions / vote / polls.
messages.experience-title: Let's make your next event more interactive.
